title: Sidewall - Fragment, 1900–25
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Oscar R. Houston
description: On light brown background, through which newsprint of verso is visible, geometric design of interlacing wide bands and vines. Metallic foil (?)-like coloring with shallow embossed texture in gold, copper and greenish-silver color. On verso: a later reproduction of a newspaper dated Vicksburg, Mississippi, July 4, 1863 is printed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Fragment, 1900–25.
1900–25. Machine-printed, newsprint. Gift of Mrs. Oscar R. Houston. 1967-73-1-a,b.
